relation: Great for these types of students
Mature students, working parents, here's our school!!!

Ask to audit or observe a class at the school you're thinking about, then have a list of questions for the teacher, counselor, and students. If I would've done this, my student loans would not be as high as they are now. Do the leg work and ask questions!!!
If what I've personally seen is any indication, this is worth the money.
Like any place, it's what you make of it. So far, I'm enjoying most of the people I interact with as far as students and staff alike.

The unique quality about this school that I've seen so far is that they focus a great deal in developing team building and group activities. This a different outlook than I'm used to. Unlike other schools, the books in the classes I've taken have been e-books. A stronger emphasis is placed on electronic education, so I hope you have a strong MS Office knowledge.

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Sandy from Argyle, WI 07/25/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 47 out of 52 people found this review useful. 2 of 1486 Categories Comments Great for these types of students This school is great for anyone who is willing to put their best foot forward for their education, life, and career. If you are willing to learn, then the University of Phoenix is for you!! Have fun and learn lots. Tips for prospective students Just make sure you read and follow your instructors directions and ask any questions you might have, because there is no such thing as a stupid question! Bang for the buck I have had several schools tell me that they can give me just as good of an education as the University of Phoenix, but for a lot less money, and I always reply with: I am happy where I am, I like everything and everyone at the University of Phoenix, and I do
